verses.content: Chun, Isu lawngah a chuong a,dîl chu a râlkai a, a umna khuo chu a tlung a.
Chun, ngai ta, zeng pakhat khuma zâl pumin a kuomah an hung zâwn a. Isûn an ringzie a hmuin, zeng kuoma chun, “Ka nau, lungmuong- takin um rawh; i suolhai ngaidam a ni tah,” a ta.
Chun, ngai ta, Dân Inchûktirtu ṭhenkhathai chun an lungrilin, “Hi mipa hin Pathien a hrilsiet a ni tie,” an ta.
Isûn an ngaituohai chu a lo hriet a, “Iengdinga in lungrila suol in ngaituo am a na?
‘I suolhai ngaidam a ni tah,’ ti le, ‘Tho la kein fe rawh,’ ti hi a ieng am ti a awl lem a?
Iengkhawm ni sienla, khawvêlah Mihriem Naupa hin suol ngaidam theina a nei ti in hrietna dingin,” a ta, (zeng kuoma chun), “Tho la, i khum la la, i inah fe rawh,” a ta.
Chun, a tho a, a inah a fe tah a.
Chun, mipuihai chun chu chu an hmuin an ṭi a, mihriemhai kuoma chuong ang thuneina petu Pathien chu an inpâk a.
Chun, Isu chutaka inthawkin a fe pei a, sie chawina hmuna ṭhung mi pakhat, a hming Matthai, a hmuh a; a kuomah, “Mi hung zui rawh,” a ta. Chuongchun, a tho a, a zui tah a.
Chun, ina chun thlaithlêng a awt laiin, ngai ta, siedâwltuhai le mi suolhai tamtak an hung a, Isu le a inchûktirhai chu an awtpui tâwl a.
Pharisaihai chun chu chu an hmuin, a inchûktirhai kuomah, “Ieng- dinga in inchûktirtuin siedâwltuhai le mi suolhai lai a fâk am a na?” an ta.
Nisienlakhawm, Isûn a hriet phingleh, “Mi hrâthai chun dâktawr an ngai nawh a, mi hrivawisiehai lemin an ngai a nih.
Chuongchun, ‘Inthâwina dit loin lunginsietna ka dit ie,’ ti hi, fe unla, a umzie vân chûk ro; mi fel takhai indawn dinga hung ka ni nawh a, mi suolhai lem indawn dinga hung ka nih in sawnnaw,” a ta.
Chu lai chun, Johan inchûktir- hai chu a kuomah an hung a, “Iengdinga keini le Pharisaihai hin bu kan nghei rawp a, i inchûktirhai hlak hin an nghei si nawh a?” an ta.

Isûn an kuomah, “Mo ṭhuoi- tuhai kuoma a pasal ding chu a um sûng phawt chun mo ṭhuoituhaiin an sûn thei am a nih? Nisienlakhawm, a pasal ding chu an kuoma inthawka ṭhuoi hmang nihai la tlung a ta, chu pha ruok chun la nghei an tih.
Chun, tukhawmin puon hlui puon la rin mar lo hlekin an phâwk ngai nawh; a phâwk pingna ding chun puon chu keithlêr lem a ta, a tlêr nasa lem ding a ni sih a.

Tukhawmin uoin thar savun uoin peng hluiah an thun ngai nawh; chuong naw chun savun penghai chu a puok khawi a, uoin chu ân buoh a, savun penghai chu a se hlak; uoin thar chu savun peng tharhaiah an thun lem hlak a nih; chuongchun, ṭhatakin a um rêl hlak,” a ta.
Chuong thu chu an kuoma a hril lai takin, ngai ta,hotu pakhat a hung a, chibai a bûk a, “Ka naunu tu el khan a thih a; nisienlakhawm, hung la, a chungah kut innghat la dam nâwk a tih,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Isu a tho a, a zui tah a, a inchûktirhai khawmin an zui veh a.
Chun, ngai ta, nuhmei pakhat, kum sâwmpahni thipûta damnaw, a hnungah a hung a, a puon hmawr a them a,
“A puon hmawr chau khawm them lang sukdamin um el ka tih,” a ti lungril a na.
Chun, Isu a nghah a, ama chu a hmuh a, “Ka naunu, lungmuongtakin um rawh, i ringna hi i dampui a nih,” a ta. Chuongchun, nuhmei chu chu dâr chena chun a hung dam tah a.
Chun, Isu hotu inah a lût a, theihle mûthai le mipui inri mur mur a va hmu chun,
“Suok ro, naupang chu a thi nawh, a in a ni lem in sawnnaw,” a ta. Anni chun ama chu an nuisan tah a.
Nisienlakhawm, mipui chu a hnawt suok hnung chun a lût a, a kutah a chel a, naupang chu a hung tho tah a.
Chu chena inthawk chun, chuong ram po poa chun chu chanchin chu ân thang suok tah a.
Chun, Isu chutaka inthawkin a fe pei a, mitdel pahniin, “David naupa, mi lunginsiet rawh,” tia khêkin an zui a.
Chun, inah a lût chun, mitdel- hai chu a kuomah an hung a; chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Hi hi thaw thei dingin in mi ring am?” a ta. Anni chun a kuomah, “Ring e, Lalpa” an ta.
Ama chun an mit a them a, “In ring angin in chungah tlung raw se,” a ta.
Chuongchun, an mit chu a hung var tah a. Chun, Isûn an kuomah, “Tukhawm ihriet naw dingin fimkhur ro,” a ti tlat a.
Nisienlakhawm, anni chu an suok a, chu ram po poa chun a chanchin an sukthang tah a.
Chun, an suok lai takin, ngai ta, khawhri iman ṭawng thei naw pakhat a kuomah an hung ṭhuoi a.
Chun, khawhri chu a hnawt dawk phingleh ṭawng thei naw chu a hung ṭawng tah a. Mipuihai chun mak an ti hleh a, “Israelhai lai khawm hieng ang hi hmu a ni ngai nawh,” an ta.
Pharisaihai ruok chun, “Khaw- hri lal leiin a nih, khawhrihai a hnawt dawk hlak chu,” an ta.
Chun, Isûn an inkhâwmna in- haia inchûktirin, Ram Chanchin Ṭha chu hrilin, damnawna tinrêng le, nat- na tinrênghai sukdamin khaw lien le khaw chînhai po po a fang pei a.
Chuongchun, mipuihai chu a hmuin, vêngtu nei naw berâmhai anga rinum le indara an um leiin, a lunginsiet ta bêk bêk el a.
Chuongchun, a inchûktirhai kuoma chun, “Bu sîk ding a tam hle sih a; nisienlakhawm, a sinthawtuhai an tlâwm.
Chuleiin, a bu sîk dinga sin- thawtu dinghai tir dingin bu Neitupa kuoma chun ngên ro,” a ta.
